pr_title: [API Change] Added ability to access BlobProperties from BlobInputStream

timeline.message: Added ability to access BlobProperties from BlobInputStream

timeline.bodyText:
Extra space.
Looking at this, I wonder if it actually would be good to do a getProperties call if they try to access the properties before reading any data instead of returning null. What do you think?
timeline.author: rickle-msft

replies.bodyText: Good idea, I'll change it to do that and document it
replies.author: gapra-msft

timeline.message: Added a call to getProperties if called before
